scripts.cleanup:gh-workflows: user=publishpress repo=publishpress-future; gh api repos/$user/$repo/actions/runs --paginate -q '.workflow_runs[] | select(.head_branch != "master") | "\(.id)"' | xargs -n1 -I % gh api --silent repos/$user/$repo/actions/runs/% -X DELETE
scripts.ray:cleanup: vendor/bin/rector process post-expirator.php src legacy tests/Acceptance tests/EndToEnd tests/Integration tests/Unit --config vendor/spatie/ray/remove-ray-rector.php
